### **PlaqView**: an interactive application to explore atherosclerosis-related scRNA-seq.

**Please be patient, it might take a while to query.**

Use this module to explore gene expression of any gene in your selected dataset. 

For a **single** gene, feature and ridge plots work well. For **multiple** genes, use dot plots.

*Please cite Ma et al., (2021) and the dataset you used in your publications*
